com.sailthru.mobile.sdk

Class NotificationCategory

  • com.sailthru.mobile.sdk.NotificationCategory

  • public class NotificationCategory

    Defines Notification Categories that can be passed to the SDK to show actions on push notifications.

    • Field Detail

      • NOTIFICATION_CATEGORY_YES_NO

        @NotNull
public static java.lang.String NOTIFICATION_CATEGORY_YES_NO

        Default SDK notification categories NotificationActionTappedListener.onNotificationActionTapped These are reserved category names and should not be used to add categories to the class NotificationConfig.

        See Also:
        NotificationActionTappedListener.onNotificationActionTapped, class NotificationConfig, Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addAction

        @NotNull
public NotificationCategory addAction(@DrawableRes
                                               int icon,
                                               @NotNull
                                               java.lang.CharSequence title,
                                               @Nullable
                                               android.content.Intent actionIntent,
                                               int flags)

        Adds an Action to an action category. Note: Actions with duplicate titles will be ignored

        Parameters:
        icon - icon to show for this action
        title - the title of the action
        actionIntent - the Intent to fire when users trigger this action
        flags - May be FLAG_ONE_SHOT, FLAG_NO_CREATE, FLAG_CANCEL_CURRENT, FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT, FLAG_IMMUTABLE or any of the flags as supported by Intent.fillIn() to control which unspecified parts of the intent that can be supplied when the actual send happens. Used for building the Action's PendingIntent.

      • addAction

        @NotNull
public NotificationCategory addAction(@DrawableRes
                                               int icon,
                                               @NotNull
                                               java.lang.CharSequence title,
                                               @Nullable
                                               android.content.Intent actionIntent,
                                               @Nullable
                                               androidx.core.app.RemoteInput remoteInput,
                                               int flags)

        Adds an Action to an action category. Note: Actions with duplicate titles will be ignored

        Parameters:
        icon - icon to show for this action
        title - the title of the action, must be unique per category
        actionIntent - the Intent to fire when users trigger this action
        remoteInput - a RemoteInput to add to the action
        flags - May be FLAG_ONE_SHOT, FLAG_NO_CREATE, FLAG_CANCEL_CURRENT, FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT, FLAG_IMMUTABLE or any of the flags as supported by Intent.fillIn() to control which unspecified parts of the intent that can be supplied when the actual send happens. Used for building the Action's PendingIntent.

      • getName

        @NotNull
public java.lang.String getName()

        The category name
